trans-unit.source: How to: Configure an Azure-Hosted Service or Client Application
trans-unit.target: How to: Configure an Azure-Hosted Service or Client Application

trans-unit.source: How to: Configure an Azure-Hosted Service Bus Service or Client Application
trans-unit.target: How to: Configure an Azure-Hosted Service Bus Service or Client Application

trans-unit.source: Configuring a service or client application that runs on <token>azure_1</token> follows the same general programming patterns for both an <token>azure_2</token> and a basic <token>sb2</token> application.
trans-unit.target: Configuring a service or client application that runs on <token>azure_1</token> follows the same general programming patterns for both an <token>azure_2</token> and a basic <token>sb2</token> application.

trans-unit.source: However, note that <token>sb2</token> must have Full Trust authorization to run on Azure.
trans-unit.target: However, note that <token>sb2</token> must have Full Trust authorization to run on Azure.

trans-unit.source: As with all other applications that use <token>sb2</token>, you must make sure that the operating system is running with Full Trust authorization.
trans-unit.target: As with all other applications that use <token>sb2</token>, you must make sure that the operating system is running with Full Trust authorization.

trans-unit.source: This can be set in the Servicedefinition.csdef file, using the procedure described in the following section.
trans-unit.target: This can be set in the Servicedefinition.csdef file, using the procedure described in the following section.

trans-unit.source: To set a Azure application to Full Trust
trans-unit.target: To set a Azure application to Full Trust

trans-unit.source: In your ServiceDefinition.csdef file, set the <codeInline>enableNativeCodeExecution</codeInline> field to <languageKeyword>true</languageKeyword> as shown in the following code, replacing <codeInline>ApplicationNameHere</codeInline> with the name of your application:
trans-unit.target: In your ServiceDefinition.csdef file, set the <codeInline>enableNativeCodeExecution</codeInline> field to <languageKeyword>true</languageKeyword> as shown in the following code, replacing <codeInline>ApplicationNameHere</codeInline> with the name of your application:
